verses.verse: וַתִּתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <S%H6419><s%> vat-tit-pal-Lel prayed חַנָּה֙ <S%H2584><s%> chan-Nah And Hannah וַתֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> vat-to-Mar, and said עָלַ֤ץ <S%H5970><s%> 'a-Latz rejoiceth לִבִּי֙ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi My heart בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, in the LORD רָ֥מָה <S%H7311><s%> Ra-mah is exalted קַרְנִ֖י <S%H7161><s%> kar-Ni mine horn בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; in the LORD רָ֤חַב <S%H7337><s%> Ra-chav is enlarged פִּי֙ <S%H6310><s%> pi my mouth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against א֣וֹיְבַ֔י <S%H341><s%> 'oy-Vai, over mine enemies כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because שָׂמַ֖חְתִּי <S%H8055><s%> sa-Mach-ti because I rejoice בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3444><s%> bi-shu-'a-Te-cha. in thy salvation
